title: Bug 9619: Move static member - Dialog details
description:
Bug 9619: Move static member - Dialog details 20020212a.
Mnemonics
No validation on the type field. Type existence is not too expensive (done in the type wizard for the superclass), so it could be done. At least isValidTypeName. Label could say 'Select destination type'. 

Browse button is too small (use SWTUtil for standard button sizes).
Title is used for long text. When going to the next page, it says 'Type not found'.
Only types from the source folders of the own project should be shown in the dialog.
Destination type can be the source type: refactoring warns that this will result in errors (which is not true) and makes pseudo changes in all referencing classes.
OB:
Browse button is too small.
When going to the next page, the title says 'Type not found'.
Types from other projects are shown in the browse dialog.
EB:
The browse button should have the standard button size.
The title should not display 'Type not found' when going to the next page.
Only types from the source folders of the current project should be shown in the browse dialog.
SR:
To reproduce: Open the browse dialog and observe that the button size is too small.
Navigate to the next page and check that the title displays 'Type not found'.
Open the browse dialog and verify that only types from the source folders of the current project are shown.
